long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very fast and completely in-sync character sheet for roll20 D&D 5e. It does not allow you to create or heavily modify a character (for now ?) but let you play characters and npcs with ease, a more compacted design and great reactivity.
